item.title: Top Customer Experience Topics at Forrester
item.description: Market research analyst Bruce Temkin lists the top 15 reports on customer experience at Forrester Research. The Customer Experience Index, 2007 [Nov. 07] The Gen Y Design Guide [Dec. 07] Young Gen Yers: Fun-Loving, Social, And Wired [Jan. 08] The Experiences That Satisfy Consumers [Feb. 08] The Business Impact Of Customer Experience [Mar. 08] Gen Y Is Truly Different; Design Accordingly [Nov. 07] Experience-Based Differentiation [Jan. 07] Obstacles To Customer Experience Success, 2008 [Feb. 08] Customer Experience Innovation In Three Steps [Feb.
